title: Does Facebook have the advantage of "chucking up to the report " of its users in Facebook?
subtitle: In late May 2019, a new feature was posted on Facebook that allows users to report technical problems by gradually shaking their phones in all mobile phone accounts.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A new Facebook feature that enabled users to report problems by shaking their phones resulted in some users being inadvertently misusing and suspending them.
